name: Russian Cars Destruction Derby
description:
Russian Cars Destruction Derby 3D - the best derby race with a Russian cars and realistic physics with true destructions!

Do you like destruction and explosions? Like the Russian car industry? Test it in practice, in a destruction race of the Russian cars!

Drift, blow, win! Be the best in the arena! Realistic car physics and damage are waiting for you! Real derby race with Russian cars!

Get behind the wheel of one of the legends in the Russian car industry and squeeze out of it all the power to the limit, to destroy everything in sight! Try your wheels on a competitor or on trampolines and crashed into other cars! Test your reflexes and driving experience in a destruction race!

Beat the cars in action to see the dynamic damage system with impressive graphics.

Visit the garage and upgrade your car a new engine, a strong body and a better handling that will radically change your ability to break objects.

Features:
- Thrilling and destructive gameplay
- Realistic physics of cars
- Real damage of Russian cars
- Tuning cars by three characteristics - body strength, motor power and control
- Paint your car - find your own style!
- Legends of the Russian car industry - VAZ 2101 "Penny", Moskvich 2141, Lada 2107 "Seven" and Lada 2108 "Eight"
- An exciting race for survival in the arena with jumps, barrels and boxes
- Three types of cameras
- Refit the car for points scored during the race
- Will last five minutes in the arena or kill all the enemies!
- Three different controls - tilt, steering wheel or arrows
- Dynamic complexity - more and more interesting!

You want to feel like a driver with the conditions of Russian car race to the bottom? Then the Russian Cars Destruction Derby 3D - your choice!
